stripped_text: When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on Lady Liberty. click, click, click: Add an agenda from HQ to your score area worth agenda points equal to the exact number of hosted power counters. Limit 1 region per server. Limit 1 per deck.
text: When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on Lady Liberty. [click], [click], [click]: Add an agenda from HQ to your score area worth agenda points equal to the exact number of hosted power counters. Limit 1 region per server. Limit 1 per deck.
title: Lady Liberty
